name: The Adventures Of Sam And Hunni RPG
name_original: The Adventures Of Sam And Hunni RPG
description:
The Adventures of Sam and Hunni is an RPG that features two friends who deliver baked goods and "Special Herbs and Seasonings" to cities all over the world. In their journeys, they'll come across a wide variety of obstacles - complications with shipping, fighting bandits, solving mysteries, and coming across a mysterious package that contains an item so powerful, that an evil force is willing to kill them both to claim it for his own....

This is a free demo release of the game, which is in ACTIVE development.

Be warned, it is very challenging, but fun. Streamers and YouTubers are encouraged to play this game.

Demo download is 100% free.
Final release: Date and Price TBA

For updates and progress on this game, follow me on Twitter: @PlayBoyMan and @PlayBoyManGames

I'm also on YouTube: Youtube.com/PBMChan

Vote for my game on Steam Greenlight!

Enjoy!

Updates (11/11/2016)

- Bigger screen size! Game's default size is now 1600x900 across all platforms. Optimized to look amazing on tablet devices (no more black bars on the sides)

  • Improved Layout of the Battle System!
  • New design of the game dialog!
  • New Title Screen!

Big thanks and credit to Yanfly and their amazing plugins.
